system.description:
When you call on your Family's allies, say what you want from them:

  • A meeting with one of their VIPs.
  • Access to a tightly-guarded location or item.
  • Information on an opportunity or threat.

Roll +Reach.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your allies are unwilling or unable to help, and word of your request may reach unfriendly ears.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: On a 7-9, you get what you wanted and 1 Data. However, your agents had to get help from a third party. Say which of your allies helped them seal the deal, and give them 1-Treaty on you.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: On a hit, you get what you wanted and 1 Data.
